schemaVersion.description: The version of the manifest list. Must always be `2`.

mediaType.description: The media type of the manifest list.

manifests.description: The manifests field contains a list of manifests for specific platforms

mediaType.description: The MIME type of the referenced object. This will generally be application/vnd.docker.distribution.manifest.v2+json, but it could also be application/vnd.docker.distribution.manifest.v1+json if the manifest list references a legacy schema-1 manifest.

size.description: The size in bytes of the object. This field exists so that a client will have an expected size for the content before validating. If the length of the retrieved content does not match the specified length, the content should not be trusted.

digest.description: The content addressable digest of the manifest in the blob store

platform.description: The platform object describes the platform which the image in the manifest runs on

architecture.description: Specifies the CPU architecture, for example amd64 or ppc64le.

os.description: Specifies the operating system, for example linux or windows

os.version.description: Specifies the operating system version, for example 10.0.10586

os.features.description: specifies an array of strings, each listing a required OS feature (for example on Windows win32k)

variant.description: Specifies a variant of the CPU, for example armv6l to specify a particular CPU variant of the ARM CPU

features.description: specifies an array of strings, each listing a required CPU feature (for example sse4 or aes).
